title: 2012 PHANTOM SERIES: CONNER COFFIN
description:
Conner talks about growing up in Santa Barbara surfing point breaks, and how that approach has shaped his style -- one that flashes more power than pop.




Join the Block Party -- 
Step 1: Download Instagram (for iPhone users) or PicPlz (for Android users)
Step 2: Use #jointheblockparty to tag pics of you and your friends having a good time... at the beach, a party, a concert, wherever, doing whatever (as long as it's legal).

What's in it for you: 1) All photos with our hashtag will be featured on an exclusive print available on Phantom Create, our new custom boardshort tool. 
2) Each week we'll send a mystery box (fyi, mystery box = free stuff) to the user whose photo received the most likes. 
3) When the promotion ends on April 10th, we'll pick our favorite 100 photos to be used in a commercial for Block Party that will premiere at the US Open of Surfing. Users whose photos are selected will also receive a free pair of Block Party boardshorts or Beachriders.
